title: Polynesian migrations and domestication of species

content.question: Which of the following was a significant effect of the Polynesian migrations in the Pacific in the period from 600 C.E. to 1450 C.E.?

choices.label: The creation of an extensive trade network connecting Pacific islands to the Asian mainland
The transfer of domesticated plant and animal species to new islands in the Pacific
The development of distinctive Polynesian maritime technologies quickly adopted by Chinese and European explorers
The establishment of an ethnically unified Polynesian state spanning several island groups

content.answer: The transfer of domesticated plant and animal species to new islands in the Pacific

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
